adHeader: LOW COST WEDDING PHOTOS $325/3HRS to $700/8HRS, PARTIES+EVENTS $125
adDetails: I am a full time professional photographer and my mission is to make your photos a treasured & sentimental part of your family's history and life story. So I offer high quality low cost wedding day photos and charge on an hourly basis. I also photograph family portraits and special events all around the SF Bay Area for very low rates. Please visit my web site at http://SentimentalPhotos.com to find out how to contact me and more details about my wedding, family portrait & event photo services and see examples of my work. Wedding Day Photos: -------------------------- $325 for 3 hours $400 for 4 hours $475 for 5 hours $550 for 6 hours $625 for 7 hours $700 for 8 hours Parties & Special Event: ----------------------------- $125 for the first hour & $50 for additional hours. Family Portraits: ---------------------- $100 for a 1.5 hours session in and around the San Ramon area. Hope to hear from you, Web Site: SentimentalPhotos.com
